Name: Junn e-commerce website.
Desc: A fully functional e-commerce platform built with React, Next.js, Zustand, and Tailwind CSS. It features a product search and a cart system, ensuring a smooth shopping experience. The website is deployed online, providing real-time access. Developed independently, it showcases my ability to build modern, scalable web applications.

Name: Nike landing page
Desc: A visually engaging and fully responsive shoe brand landing page built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Redux Toolkit. It features smooth animations, a dynamic product showcase, customer testimonials, and a compelling call-to-action to enhance user engagement. Designed for performance and responsiveness, the page ensures a seamless browsing experience across all devices. Independently developed and deployed online, it highlights my ability to create modern and interactive web experiences.

Name: Youtube clone
Desc: A fully functional YouTube clone built with React, Tailwind CSS, Redux Toolkit, and Axios for data fetching. It features key functionalities such as video upload, playback, comments, and likesâ€”all designed to mimic the core features of YouTube. The backend is powered by Node.js to handle server-side operations. Developed independently, this project showcases my ability to build interactive media platforms with both frontend and backend integration. Deployed live, it provides an immersive user experience for browsing and interacting with videos.

Name: Campusgist social media website
Desc: A social media platform for campus students built with React, Tailwind CSS, Redux Toolkit, Axios, and a Django backend with PostgreSQL for data storage. The platform includes features such as messaging, user profiles, posts, likes, comments, and the ability to join groups, designed to foster communication and community. The frontend interacts seamlessly with the backend for real-time updates and data management. Developed as part of a team, this project showcases my ability to collaborate on dynamic and scalable full-stack web applications.
